name: The Legend of Pitou
description:
I am in no manner affiliated with The Messenger. I am just a fan who happened to have an theory about a particular event in the game and I also happen to make games. The Messenger is an awesome platformer released on Nintendo Switch, PS4 and PC developed by Sabotage Studio and published by Devolver Digital. You should give it a try!
